name: Lord of the Die
description:
Look out for enemy dice as you try and find the key to unlock the teleporter within randomly generated dungeons! You can fight using your grass, fire, and water elemental attacks! Remember: Grass beats Water, Water beats Fire, and Fire beats Grass. And if you and an enemy clash with the same elemental attack then the one who rolled the highest number wins!

Controls: WASD/Left Stick to move, Mouse/Right Stick to look, 1/West Face Button for grass attack, 2/North Face Button for fire attack, 3/East Face Button for water attack.
